Package edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.entity

Class CompanyRepresentative

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.entity.User
edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.entity.CompanyRepresentative
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CompanyRepresentative extends User
Represents a company representative user in the system. Extends User class demonstrating inheritance.
